events.text: And by work, I mean make it the bottom of our dungeon.
It's quite dangerous.
Hold on, hold on! What I meant was, where did you come from?
This entire building wasn't here a few minutes ago!
And what do you mean dungeon?
To keep our operations running, we utilize cutting-edge magic generators.
Unfortunately, the energy tends to attact monsters, and the fuel tends to attract raiders.
I take it you're the latter?
What? No, I just want you to move this building and all the monsters somewhere else!
(And also maybe pocket some loose change here and there...)
Unfortunately, I don't have authority to translocate this structure.
You can lodge a formal complaint with the boss though.
His office is on the top floor of this tower.
Oh, the elevator's out so I'm afraid you will have to climb.
If there's anything else I can help you with, feel free to ask.
No, I'm good.
(...What is this place?)
(Maybe I should go to the top floor of the tower to see who's in charge.)
If you want to go to the top floor, take this key.
Use it to enter the office complex.
...Thanks.
